mapper.sql: id, order_no, type, sn, tenant_id, del_flag, create_time, update_time, remark
mapper.insert:
insert into t_asset_inventory_detail(order_no, type, sn, tenant_id, del_flag, create_time, update_time, remark) values
(#{item.orderNo},#{item.type},#{item.sn}, #{item.tenantId}, #{item.delFlag}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.updateTime}, #{item.remark})
